;Perhaps we all have relatives like this: some are admitted to college, some are Those who are from technical secondary school or junior college will inevitably be compared among relatives. A promising future does not depend on academic qualifications. It may be reflected in attitude, way of thinking, endurance and perseverance, etc. This article tells such a story.

;
;

;
;

;

;1

;

;Until the accident in 2016, we didn’t have a good impression of Zhao Jie.

;

;Several relatives on my mother’s side live close to each other. When we were young, the children of our generation all had a good relationship, except Zhao Jie. He is the second eldest child in the ranking, four years younger than the eldest, Jiang Yichao, and three months older than me. Ordinarily, he and Jiang Yichao are both boys, so they can play together better. In fact, Jiang Yichao has the same bad temper as me. Grandma said, if you and two devils get together, who can have peace in the whole family? After finishing, he turned around and praised Zhao Jie. Look at our second boy. Sooner or later, he will see you. He is solid and does not cry or make trouble. It will save you more worry.

;

;Zhao Jie is the son of his second aunt. The second aunt had been weak since she was a child and could not keep the baby alive after marriage. At that time, people were reluctant to spend money on serious hospitals and would rather believe in rural folk remedies. The second aunt went to the hospital after losing three children in a row after her home remedies failed to work. She already had habitual miscarriages. The doctor advised that if you really like children, you can’t adopt one. After struggling for another two or three years, the light of hope gradually disappeared. The couple was ready to adopt a child, but they became pregnant with Zhao Jie. I didn't have high hopes at first, but I unexpectedly saved the fetus through careful care. It is said that Zhao Jie was born weighing less than five pounds and weighing like a small mouse. He was born with insufficient physical strength and his cry was weak. It was not easy to get a child. The second aunt and his wife were afraid that something might happen, so they would follow them wherever they went. They would not let him do anything and would not let him move. They wished they could tie a rope to his trousers, so Zhao Jie developed the "unnecessary and lively" attitude. character.

;

;Everyone said that Zhao Jie’s ability to come out of his second aunt’s belly alive was a blessing from heaven, so it’s understandable that his parents should be worried. But sometimes he looks unsociable and listless. Grandma turns her back on the second aunt and complains to others. The second boy is too lifeless. Although Xiaochao and Xiaoyu are noisy, they are still children, and they only look like children when they are noisy.

;

;Ordinary children like me and Jiang Yichao, who could not score above 95 in the exam, were beaten and scolded. If you dare to fall below 90 points, your entire vacation will be ruined. If you don’t have pocket money, if you have a little bit of fun, your parents will whisper a few faint words of ridicule, saying that you can’t study well and you are very enthusiastic about doing things that are not famous. It was also mixed with some cold violence, which was more terrifying than being beaten and scolded. When I came to Zhao Jie, my grades have been stable at 60 or 70 since the first grade of elementary school. Jiang Yichao spoke, which was enough to at least cut off two of my dad's belts. However, the second aunt is always very proud. My Jeva is 67 in Chinese and 69 in mathematics this time.

;

;For this reason, Jiang Yichao and I were often jealous of Zhao Jie when we were young. What a fate, we were reincarnated into the second aunt's house.

;

;Zhao Jie’s substitute teacher saw that his grades were always at the bottom, so he talked to his second aunt and his wife. The words were polite at the beginning. Children's education cannot rely solely on schools and teachers. Parents should also provide more guidance at home, so that children can grow better and faster.

;

;My second uncle said that my child’s brain is innate, he can learn whatever he wants, and too much help will only encourage the child to grow.

;

;The teacher was stunned.

;

;The second uncle went on to say, besides what good academic performance is, I think many people who were good at studying when they were young will not be the same when they grow up. .

;

;The teacher came back to his senses and told the truth. It would be fine if he was the only one who was worse. The problem was that such a rat-shit type of student would bring down the performance of the whole class, the whole grade, and even the whole school. level, have you ever thought about this?

;

;The second aunt sneered, "Come on, let's go. Our school is at that level. Is it my child's turn to bring it down?"

;

;In this way, Zhao Jie became the public enemy of the teachers. She didn't do anything to him, she just ignored him openly and treated him like nothing. Zhao Jie was a man of temper and didn't say anything. The second aunt and her husband were vaguely aware of it but didn't take it seriously. For a long time, they told everyone they met that the teacher wanted to talk to them, but they were taught a lesson. By the time he realized something was wrong, it was already too late. Zhao Jie said he didn't want to go to school.

;

;No one seemed surprised that Zhao Jie dropped out of junior high school. But he is less than 15 years old, so what can he do if he doesn't go to school? According to my uncle and my father's wishes, they could send me to a technical school to learn things like car repair, cooking, hairdressing, etc. If I have a skill, at least I won't be hungry. The second aunt and her husband also planned this. After that, he said that the child’s personal wishes must be respected. Four elders gathered around Zhao Jie to do ideological work. No matter what you learn, you can't let this life be ruined. Zhao Jie just smiled and said nothing. My uncle has a bad temper. He is planning for your future and your whole life. Why are you laughing at such a serious matter? Zhao Jie stopped laughing and still didn't speak. The second aunt is trying to smooth things over, but Jeva is not good at expressing herself. Let’s just say, he just listens. If he has an opinion, he will speak it out, right Jeva? Zhao Jie nodded warmly.

;

;The adults talked to each other and discussed the matter of choosing a school and a major. After saying that, he turned to look at Zhao Jie, who was already playing a game with headphones on. My dad had a slow temper and glanced at me without saying a word. My uncle couldn't hold it back, so he immediately stood up and walked over. Before he could say anything while taking off his earphones, the second uncle quickly stopped him. His children are like children. They don't want to cause trouble and just like to have fun. We adults can just discuss it.

;

;My uncle did not expect this to be the case. He held the earphones in his hands and was stunned for a moment. It would be wrong if Zhao Jie put them back on, and it would be wrong if he didn't put them back on. My dad said leisurely while blowing smoke rings, now I don’t have to respect his personal wishes anymore?

;

;The second aunt immediately got angry. You two are elders, why are you trying to get into trouble with a child?

;

;My father and my uncle were worried about Zhao Jie's future. They came to the door with enthusiasm and wanted to help solve the problem. As a result, the three members of the family were poured a basin of ice water on each person, which made them feel cold. Go back and tell your grievances to my mother. My mother will tell you why my mother and I advised you not to get involved in this matter in the first place. Why can't you see it? The baby was spoiled by those couple! I had to mess around blindly, but fortunately I have come back to fight against you now. Otherwise, believe it or not, if you interfere here and there, you will definitely become enemies in the end.

;

;My uncle is very stubborn, let’s see what you say.

;

;My mother raised her voice to suppress my uncle. What did I say? Let’s put it bluntly, aren’t the children in technical schools all trash who were kicked out of the school, smoking, drinking and fighting, how many are good? With Zhao Jie's small mind and body, it doesn't matter whether he learns skills or not. If something happens to him when he is bullied, you can see that the second sister will bite back and fight you two. Don’t listen to your advice, don’t listen to your advice, and yet, people have already fallen out with you, yet you still don’t believe in evil?

;

;What my mother said is true. Because of this matter, my second aunt actually became estranged from my family and my uncle's family. Zhao Jie didn't go to technical school either. Grandma said that the second aunt felt sorry for Zhao Jie because he was too young and she was worried about sending him to a technical school. I also saw that Zhao Jie loved watching martial arts movies, so after much deliberation I sent him to a martial arts school in the suburbs. The school offered half a day of cultural classes and half a day of martial arts training. At least junior high school classes will not be left behind. The second aunt thought so, but after half a semester, Zhao Jie became so thin that he was as thin as a skeleton. The second aunt felt compassion again, so she stopped going to the martial arts school.

;

;Zhao Jie is at home, and his second aunt is still proud of himself. A young man of this age can disappear all day long and make trouble everywhere. But our Jeva is different. Just stay indoors and watch TV, so you don't have to worry.

;

;Grandpa commented that at the age when she should be struggling, she was living like a retired cadre, how could she have the nerve to show off.

;

; 

;

;2

;

;Since grandpa can’t stand it, Zhao Jie is the only one who accompanies grandpa to play checkers, chess, and two-player poker. For those who don't mind the afternoon, Zhao Jie was sent to his grandfather's house by his second aunt. Although he said he was spending time with the elderly, he was still afraid that Zhao Jie would get sick from being bored at home alone.

;

;Grandpa is naturally happy. Jiang Yichao left for college, and he was not used to being anywhere. When Zhao Jie came, he just filled this gap. However, within a few days of being happy, I started to worry about my grandson. What will happen to this good child if he is left idle like this? I took Zhao Jie out with me from time to time. I went to flower, bird, fish and insect markets for the elderly, calligraphy and painting exhibitions for children, and more advanced ones such as the Youth Science and Technology Grand Prix. Grandpa was holding on to some luck - maybe Zhao Jie would be able to discover some unusual talent in his hands.

;

;On this day, the grandfather and grandson went to a venue in the southern suburbs to watch a network design competition. Halfway through the car ride, Zhao Jie pointed out the car window and asked, "Why is there so much smoke when burning?" Grandpa took a look at the crematorium, what do you mean it was burned? Zhao Jie said, Oh, the crematorium, do you have to carry it here and burn it after you die?

;

;Elderly people are sensitive to death, can they listen to this? The relationship between grandfather and grandson, which had been close for less than a month, broke down on the spot. Zhao Jie was sent back to his home and once again lived the life of a retired veteran cadre.

;

;The summer vacation will soon come, and the results of the high school entrance examination will be announced. I followed in the footsteps of Jiang Yichao and successfully entered the key class of the city's No. 1 Middle School. When grandpa talks, Xiaochao and Xiaoyu make people worry-free. You younger ones should learn more from your elder brothers and sisters.

;

;The middle brother Zhao Jie was omitted for no reason.

;

;The second aunt heard somewhere that driving an excavator makes a lot of money, no matter ten thousand or twenty thousand a month. This time they didn't ask for Zhao Jie's opinion and sent him directly to a technical school to learn how to excavate.

;

;When the family heard the news, they inevitably used Jiang Yichao and Zhao Jie as positive and negative teaching materials to educate us.

;

;Jiang Yichao went to a key university and was already very proud. However, with Zhao Jie setting him off like this, he was like a proud man at home. He himself was not polite, with his tail raised to the sky, and he always lectured me with the air of a veteran, who was already overwhelmed by high school life. "Third brother, please work harder. In today's society, if I can't get into college, I will be stuck for the rest of my life." But it’s over. Look at your second brother. The sentence added at the end, "Look at your second brother," makes people feel very uncomfortable. I thought to myself, how interesting would it be for you to pull your ass and compete with someone who is inherently inferior? But in fact, I am also very afraid. I am afraid that if I make a wrong step at this time, the road ahead will be difficult every step of the way. I don't want to end my life so early.

;

;At that time, I didn’t know that the path of life, regardless of right or wrong, was mostly difficult. I was frightened by what everyone said about Zhao Jie's future, which was already several times inferior to others even before he arrived. So while sympathizing with Zhao Jie, he also worked hard to avoid becoming Zhao Jie. This is what adults want to see. Whether I want to hear it or not, news about Zhao Jie is constantly reaching my ears. The excavator is not that easy to drive. In the human society, you have to be smart wherever you go. Zhao Jie is not good at it. He will not flatter the master when he goes on a construction site internship. In the past few months, he has not entered the cockpit more than ten times. But he also has poor self-control and is addicted to the Internet. He spends all day and night playing games in Internet cafes. His health was already weak, and his second uncle was afraid that he would eventually develop a fatal disease if things continued like this, so he took him home to support him. But Internet addiction is so easy to overcome. I heard that there were times when my second uncle had no choice but to accompany Zhao Jie to an Internet cafe to play games. My son was working hard in front of the computer, and I moved a stool to sit behind and watch. The father and son stayed up together all night long.

;

;During this period, the second aunt took the initiative to restore the previous intimacy with several families. She also began to complain a little when she mentioned Zhao Jie in front of everyone. My mother refuted her, saying that Jeva was spoiled by you and your brother-in-law. If the second aunt doesn't recognize him, why should we spoil him? You all know that he is innately incapable of withstanding beatings. He cannot be beaten gently or hard. He is not as strong as you guys. If he disobeys, he will be served with a belt and a stick. How can he not be successful? My mother said that if you can't stand the beating, there are education methods for those who can't stand the beating. You can't just let him go as he pleases? The second aunt asked back, how do we still need to educate her? She has said everything that needs to be said, and her words are all worn out, so how do she still need us to educate her?

;

;My mother wanted to say something else, but my grandmother blocked her with a look.

;

;Shortly after this, Zhao Jie ran away from home. No news at all. The second aunt and second uncle searched aimlessly for a few days, and were wondering whether to go to the police station to report her missing. They received a message from Zhao Jie, a classmate, saying that he was in the provincial capital and was applying for a job as a dishwasher in the back kitchen of a hotel. , let the family not worry.

;

;It’s just nonsense. The second aunt fell seriously ill and became even weaker. I burst into tears in front of my brothers and sisters. What did I raise? I raised a wolf with a big tail. He doesn't do the errands arranged for him well and goes out to wash dishes for others. He has never washed a single dish for me at home, but instead goes out to wash dishes for others.

;

;My uncle said, if it doesn’t work, we should find a way to arrest the person. If the excavator doesn’t work, it is at least a technical job, and there is no future for washing dishes.

;

;The second aunt shook her head, forget it, I have seen through it, he just doesn’t want to make life easier for me and his dad. I don’t care what he likes in the future.

;

;Grandma curled her lips, I’m afraid it’s not that you don’t want to take care of it, but that people grow up and have their own ideas, so you don’t want to take care of it, right?

;

;My uncle was talking, and my parents were disciplining us at that time. Whoever made a mistake would not be beaten all over the floor? The only second child is as sick and weak as Lin Daiyu. Not to mention beatings, the whole family dare not say a word loudly in front of her, so she is used to bad habits. Now she's fine, she gave birth to a son and gave birth to a replica, dedicated to treating her.

;

; 

;

;3

;

;Before I was admitted to college and left home, my grandparents planned a family dinner. Grandma was a good cook, but as she got older, my mother was afraid that her body wouldn’t be able to handle such a chore, so she asked her aunt and aunt to help her do it. Everyone in the family agreed, and the second aunt came out and said that Zhao Jie had done a good job in the kitchen of the hotel and learned some skills. Now that his sister was admitted to college, it was a great thing, and he also came up with a job. If you don't have the strength, why not let him be the chef.

;

;This is a problem for my parents. Don't let him do it. It's my nephew's wedding and it's a family dinner. It doesn't make sense not to give him a chance to try it out. Let him do it, that's not the way he behaves. If he can't bear it, or if the food is hard to swallow, it will make a happy party look neither yin nor yang, which is not good.

;

;In the end, it was my mother who spoke. The young man has been training outside for a year and must have learned something. He only spoke this way when he was confident. Let him come if he wants to, and I'll watch from the side. How could I be wrong?

;

;Before that family dinner, we had not seen Zhao Jie for more than two or three years. For a moment, he didn't recognize it. He was much taller, stronger, and darker. There was no trace of frailty on his body. Jiang Yichao wondered to me, you said he stayed in the kitchen all day long, why did he still get dark? Could it be that fluorescent lamps can also make people tan? After Jiang Yirui heard this, she ran to ask Zhao Jie what her brother had said. Jiang Yichao was frightened, thinking that Zhao Jie was angry. People just smiled, who said they only stayed in the kitchen? We go out to deliver goods and purchase goods. Sometimes we don’t have enough manpower and we have to go out to deliver food under the sun. Jiang Yichao shook his head after hearing this. It's too hard. If it were you, you wouldn't be able to persevere. The sense of superiority in his words was not hidden at all. Zhao Jie stopped talking, put on an apron and entered the kitchen.

;

;After the banquet started, Zhao Jie has been busy in the kitchen. His craftsmanship is really good, he mixes meat and vegetables well, and he prepares the dishes quickly. In the middle, my second uncle asked him to come out and toast me with a glass of wine. When I think of him again, I don’t know when he has gone. At that time, the family dinner was coming to an end, and my uncle frowned. There were so many elders here, and it was not polite to leave without saying hello. The second aunt said coquettishly, you were drinking when you said hello, and you didn't even raise your eyebrows. He was still in a hurry to go back to the hotel. The uncle snorted and continued to punch his uncle.

;

;Grandma went to the kitchen to serve soup. When I came back, I was full of praise for Zhao Jie. He was a capable young man and cooked decently. He also cleaned up the kitchen for me before leaving. Okay, I think this guy is very good.

;

;My dad is drunk, so what’s the use of looking after him? We’ve watched this kid grow up, he’s not reliable.

;

;My uncle also drank a lot and kept echoing that his good performance today was temporary. His brother and sister have all gone to college, but he is the only one who has no future. It is impossible to do such a small thing well. A useless person. Why didn't he come to the table? I know I'm embarrassed, but it's a pity that it's too late!

;

;I don’t know how the second uncle and my uncle got into a fight. By the time I reacted, my second uncle was already holding a kitchen knife in one hand. Fortunately, there were many people trying to stop the fight. Jiang Yichao and his aunt hugged his uncle's waist, his aunts and uncles dragged his second uncle, and my father grabbed his knife-holding arm with both hands to prevent him from moving. This prevented the matter from further deteriorating into social news.

;

;Jiang Yirui and I stood against the wall and watched. Finally, she praised in my ear, Niuxi, sister, the dinner party at my brother’s college was so bland as water, but there was no such dramatic tension as yours. Cowhide!

;

;This farce has subsided and it is getting late. After sending off the uncle and second uncle's family, the other elders stood up to say goodbye one after another with awkward smiles on their faces. Grandma grabbed grandma's hand, her face full of shame, what a shame! I made you laugh, my mother-in-law. Grandma shook her head repeatedly. We are all a family and we don’t say such out-of-the-way things.

;

;This is how the second aunt and uncle's family became enemies. During those two or three years, the two families never appeared at the same time when visiting relatives during festivals or birthdays. I heard that once my aunt moved to a new house, she neglected to treat the two families at the same time. As a result, my uncle and second uncle met in front of the hotel. When the two met, they thought that my aunt wanted to be a peacemaker and persuade them to make peace. They immediately turned around and headed back home. After that, no one dared to bring up the matter of persuading peace.

;

;In the eyes of everyone, although Zhao Jieren was not present, the family dinner was ruined because of him, and the feud between the two families also started because of him. The elders who were already dissatisfied with him didn't say a good word when they mentioned him, as if he was a lost star. And I, who was originally full of sympathy for him, became completely disgusted with him because the family dinner held for me was interrupted.

;

; 

;

;4

;

;The accident happened after Qingming Festival. One month before the Qingming Festival, news came from my hometown that the county development zone had taken a fancy to the land where my family's ancestral tomb is located and allowed the tomb to be moved. The village party secretary belonged to the same family as my grandfather. He called my grandfather and told him that the site for the new tomb he had chosen personally was absolutely fine. But to be on the safe side, people who are out of town might as well go back and take a look.

;

;Firstly, my mother’s family are superstitious and believe that the feng shui of the ancestral graves will affect future generations; secondly, I want to take advantage of the fact that the old graves are still there before moving the graves, so that the whole family can go back to worship their ancestors. So we discussed collective action.

;

;At this time, almost four years had passed since the uncle and second uncle had a bad relationship. During this period, I went to college until I was about to graduate; Jiang Yichao insisted on finding a job outside of college after graduating from college, but his uncle and aunt refused to listen and had no choice but to let him go; Zhao Jie met a good master in the hotel where he was admitted and learned more skills. , after being introduced by the master, he returned to a local three-star hotel to work as a chef. The hotel is less than half an hour's drive from home by bus, but Zhao Jie still chooses to stay and go home for the holidays. The second aunt still praised me as usual, saying that my son is very filial and knows that I am not in good health. He still wants to come back to me after running around and learning skills. Uncle sneered, deceiving himself. There are so many hotels in the provincial capital, and the treatment is much better than ours. If he had to run back, he would probably offend people outside and be unable to survive. Of course, no one dared to leak any information about this to the second aunt and second uncle.

;

;So when my uncle approached my dad about renting a minivan and sharing the gas and tolls equally among the four families, even though my dad knew it was much more cost-effective than driving each family back separately, he was still very hesitant. My uncle said, I know what you are worried about. They are all relatives. With broken bones and tendons, there is no obstacle that cannot be overcome. What's more, it's been so many years. Don't worry, I will never make trouble. Even if he makes trouble, for the sake of my parents, I, as the eldest, can tolerate it. My dad thinks about it, no matter how old he is, he should be safe. Then agreed.

;

;At that time, Jiang Yichao was working overtime and could not go back. I'm busy with my graduation project and can't go back. Zhao Jie works in a hotel, so statutory holidays are not valid for them, and they cannot go back. Everyone is here except the three of us. I heard that although my uncle and my second aunt didn't talk to each other all the way, they got along fairly smoothly. After the family was busy with their business, they also took some free time to visit a newly built scenic spot in the nearby mountains for a day.

;

;The accident happened on the way back on the highway.

;

;The first person to receive the call was Jiang Yichao. Then there's me. When the ambulance arrived, the second aunt lay on the stretcher, woke up from the frightened coma, and asked Jeva where she was. Only then did Jiang Yirui remember that she had forgotten to notify Zhao Jie. The order of arriving at the hospital was exactly the opposite. Zhao Jie arrived first, then me. The things that need to be dealt with are very complicated - those who go into the operating room, those who stay in the hospital for observation, those who get stitches for wounds, those who put in slings, and even the doctors, nurses, traffic police team, and the person who was knocked unconscious while sitting in our car. The neighbor boy had almost settled everything, and Jiang Yichao showed up.

;

;That was the first time for a few of us to take on responsibility. When Jiang Yirui called me, her voice was vibrating. I rushed to the hospital and saw that the elders were badly injured, with blood everywhere they looked, moans in their ears, and they were confused, standing there not knowing what to do. Zhao Jie, on the other hand, did not lose his mind. He first arranged for Jiang Yirui to send his frightened but uninjured grandparents and cousins ​​home. He also took me to cooperate with doctors and nurses to arrange examinations, infusions, and payment of various fees for the elders.

;

;I was like a robot, following Zhao Jie in confusion all the way, doing whatever he ordered me to do. Zhao Jie saw that I was distracted, so he comforted me when he had some free time. At this juncture, we must not be reckless or stupid, we must be smart. I said I wanted to, but I couldn’t do it. Zhao Jie said, if you think you can't do it, you really won't be able to do it. You have to tell yourself that you can do it, keep saying it, and many times you can actually do it. you try. I said you, a semi-illiterate, understand psychological suggestion? After saying this, I realized I had made a mistake and mentally slapped myself.

;

;Zhao Jie was generous and said disapprovingly, "I don't understand what psychological suggestion is." All I know is that since I was little, everyone around me, especially my parents, has said that I can’t do it. My health is not good, my study is not good, no one expects me to do things, and my words are not on point... I also feel that I am not good. No matter what I do, my first reaction is that I will definitely not be able to do it. There was a time when I was obsessed with playing games. Actually, it wasn’t because the games were so fun. It was the first time in that game that I felt like I was pretty good. In order to prove myself, I even took my dad to an Internet cafe to watch me play, but he couldn't understand. He sighed and told my mother that I could forget my last name when I played games, and I was destined to be a useless person in this life. My mother didn't shy away from me. From then on, she told me all day long that she was a burden and causing trouble for herself... So you ran away from home?

;

;Hmm. I want to give myself some credit, and also want to see if I can do it without relying on my parents. It's hard to be alone outside. Every time I can't hold on, I tell myself over and over again in my heart, you can do it. If you hold your breath again, you will definitely be able to do it. When it doesn't work, cry and sleep for a while, then filter it out as an accident, and only remember the things that can be done in your mind. So I persisted. Slowly I discovered that I was actually not as bad as everyone said.

;

;I said, this is psychological suggestion. Although you have never heard of this theory, what you do is the explanation of this theory.

;

;2016年那场意外之后，当大家说起赵杰，没人再提先天不足这几个字，他成为一个可以被拿到正常标准下比较的普通人。疫情三年多少饭馆倒闭，而他却凭一己之力保住了店铺。

;

;二姨再次骄傲起来，养孩子，学上得好不好不是首要的，还是要看家长怎么教育。你看我们家赵杰……
